node.name: Quiz
node.rich_text:
34) What is a common use for a server? Ans.)
store files for more than one computer to access
collect and deliver email for an organization

*
host a website
35.) What is a service? Ans) program on a computer that does a specific function
36.) What is the problem with hosting a service accessible by other computers? Ans.) Opens the server hosting the service to potential malicious access
